data.name: Goat of Duty Digital ArtBook
data.detailed_description:
The Official Goat of Duty Digital Artbook (so many goats!) The players who purchase Goat of Duty (or that purchased the game in the past) will receive this DLC for free.

We are already very proud of all of you goating around this sensational multiplayer shooter! You are amazing players and we encourage you to purchase this DLC if you want to keep supporting this initiative with us.
data.about_the_game:

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Russian, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3 2.6Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics Pro 580 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 3.0Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
